item.title: Shinobi
item.description: Details> Details # This template adds Shinobi, a network video recorder (NVR) for viewing and recording IP cameras. Original maintainer MiGoller’s ShinobiDocker, mariadb How to enable> How to enable # Add the domain to get SSL, replacing “domain.
